unnormalised: Hey students, tired of hunting for scholarships like trying to find the perfect biryani recipe? There's good news! A bunch of awesome scholarship portals are making life easier for students across India.
normalised: Hey students, tired of hunting for scholarships like trying to find the perfect biryani recipe? There's good news! A bunch of awesome scholarship portals are making life easier for students across India.

unnormalised: Think of them as online treasure troves, connecting you with funding opportunities based on your course, background, and even your mom's secret ingredient for sambar (okay, maybe not that last one!). From IIT Delhi aspirants to folks studying arts in Kerala, there's something for everyone.
normalised: Think of them as online treasure troves, connecting you with funding opportunities based on your course, background, and even your mom's secret ingredient for sambar (okay, maybe not that last one!). From I I T Delhi aspirants to folks studying arts in Kerala, there's something for everyone.

unnormalised: These platforms often have user-friendly interfaces, filters, and even application tips. So, skip endlessly scrolling through university websites and head over to these scholarship portals.
normalised: These platforms often have user-friendly interfaces, filters, and even application tips. So, skip endlessly scrolling through university websites and head over to these scholarship portals.

unnormalised: Many offer options starting from Rs. 5,000 to several lakhs! Imagine funding that masters degree abroad or that coding bootcamp you've been eyeing.
normalised: Many offer options starting from rupee five thousand to several lakhs! Imagine funding that masters degree abroad or that coding bootcamp you've been eyeing.

unnormalised: Plus, it’s almost Onam! What better time to spend some time researching and applying? Think of it as a pre-festival investment in your future. Forget navigating bureaucratic nightmares; these portals aim to streamline the process. Go get that scholarship!
normalised: Plus, it’s almost Onam! What better time to spend some time researching and applying? Think of it as a pre-festival investment in your future. Forget navigating bureaucratic nightmares; these portals aim to streamline the process. Go get that scholarship!
